statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ShipmentID , AA.OrderItemID , AA.ShippedQty
FROM dbo.TShipmentInvoice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ShipmentID = #ShipmentID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TShipmentInvoice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TShipmentInvoice ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ShipmentID, InvoiceNo, DeliveryCode, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ShipmentID#, #InvoiceNo#, #DeliveryCode#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TShipmentInvoice SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ShipmentID = #ShipmentID# , InvoiceNo = #InvoiceNo# , DeliveryCode = #DeliveryCode# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
